root: ^Kyle;My picture should be in the top-left.
^Kyle;I am a very generic white guy, so I wouldn't blame you if you dont remember me.
^Kyle;I finished sending out invitations this morning
^Kyle;(though we both know full well people are going to sneak in)
^Kyle;Tanya wanted me to make an exception though
^Kyle;I'm happy to make it too. Heard a lot about you.
^Kyle;Show this text thread at the front door and they'll let you right in.
^Kyle;It will be nice to have you there.

c-1: ^Player;Thank you! And sorry about the things I said earlier...
g-0: ^Kyle;Tanya also asked if you could have a +1
^Kyle;According to my Handy Spreadsheet, I already invited Hema and Jessie. They're cool.
^Kyle;The other people in your group are...
^Kyle;Which of them would you like to bring along tomorrow?
^Kyle;From what Tanya says, they both sound cool!

c-0: ^Player;The group has been a bit fractured lately--especially where he's concerned--and I think this is exactly what we need to stick together.
^Kyle;I'm not exactly sure what 14 bags of crisps will do for your friendship...
c-1: ^Player;She could really use the support right now--emotionally and mentally. I think our recent rough patch as a group has been particularly rough for her.
^Kyle;I'm not exactly sure what 14 bags of crisps will do for her state of afffairs...
